name: dense-dashboard
description: High-density dashboard layout with compact spacing for data-heavy screens
css_values: gap: 12px; padding: 16px; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr))
use_case: Admin dashboards displaying KPIs, charts, and summary cards

name: admin-panel
description: Full-height admin panel with collapsible sidebar and main content area
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: auto 1fr; height: 100vh; overflow: hidden
use_case: Admin panels with navigation sidebar and detail content

name: data-table-container
description: Scrollable table container with sticky header and pagination footer
css_values: overflow-x: auto; position: relative; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid var(--border)
use_case: Data-heavy tables with sorting, filtering, and bulk actions

name: sidebar-nav
description: Collapsible sidebar navigation with icon-only compact mode
css_values: width: 240px; transition: width 200ms; &.collapsed { width: 64px }
use_case: Primary navigation in admin panels

name: form-layout
description: Two-column form layout with label-input pairs and action footer
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 200px 1fr; gap: 16px 24px; align-items: start
use_case: Complex forms with many fields (user creation, settings)

name: master-detail
description: Split-pane layout with list on left and detail panel on right
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 360px 1fr; height: 100%; overflow: hidden
use_case: CRUD interfaces with list + detail view

name: stat-widget
description: Compact stat card with metric value, trend indicator, and sparkline area
css_values: padding: 16px; min-width: 200px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px
use_case: Dashboard KPI widgets showing metrics with change indicators

name: filter-bar
description: Horizontal filter bar with multiple filter controls and search input
css_values: display: flex; gap: 8px; padding: 12px 0; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: center
use_case: Table filtering with dropdowns, search, and date ranges

name: bulk-action-bar
description: Floating action bar shown when rows are selected in a table
css_values: position: sticky; bottom: 0; padding: 12px 16px; background: var(--primary); color: white; border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0
use_case: Bulk operations on selected table rows (delete, export, status change)

name: tab-section
description: Tab-based section layout for organizing related content groups
css_values: border-bottom: 2px solid var(--border); padding: 0 16px
use_case: Organizing user profile, settings, or entity details into tabs

name: card-grid-dashboard
description: Responsive card grid for dashboard widgets with drag-drop zones
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(12, 1fr); gap: 16px; grid-auto-rows: minmax(120px, auto)
use_case: Customizable dashboard with draggable widget cards

name: breadcrumb-header
description: Page header with breadcrumb navigation, title, and action buttons
css_values: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding: 16px 24px; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border)
use_case: Top of detail/edit pages with navigation context

name: modal-form
description: Modal dialog layout for create/edit forms with header, scrollable body, and footer
css_values: max-width: 640px; max-height: 80vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column
use_case: Quick create/edit forms without leaving the current page

name: audit-log-layout
description: Timeline-style layout for displaying audit/activity logs
css_values: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 0; border-left: 2px solid var(--border); padding-left: 24px
use_case: Activity history, audit trails, change logs

name: settings-page
description: Full-width settings page with categorized sections and save footer
css_values: max-width: 720px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 24px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 32px
use_case: System settings, user preferences, configuration pages

name: booking-flow
description: Multi-step booking wizard with progress indicator and summary sidebar
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 320px; gap: 24px; max-width: 1080px; margin: 0 auto
use_case: Hotel room booking process with step-by-step progression

name: room-card
description: Visual card layout with hero image, details, pricing, and CTA
css_values: border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)
use_case: Room listing cards in search results or gallery

name: calendar-grid
description: Monthly calendar grid with cell states for availability and pricing
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(7, 1fr); gap: 1px; background: var(--border)
use_case: Room availability calendar, date picker with pricing

name: hero-section
description: Full-width hero banner with background image, overlay text, and search bar
css_values: position: relative; min-height: 400px; display: flex; align-items: center; background-size: cover
use_case: Landing page hero with search functionality

name: pricing-table
description: Comparison table layout for room types with features and pricing
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 200px repeat(auto-fit, minmax(180px, 1fr)); gap: 0; border: 1px solid var(--border)
use_case: Room type comparison, rate plan comparison

name: guest-form
description: Compact guest information form with auto-fill support
css_values: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 16px; max-width: 480px
use_case: Guest registration, check-in forms

name: review-card
description: Compact review card with rating stars, author info, and text
css_values: padding: 16px; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border)
use_case: Guest reviews and ratings display

name: gallery-grid
description: Masonry-style image gallery with lightbox support
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(240px, 1fr)); gap: 8px
use_case: Room and hotel photo galleries

name: search-results
description: Two-column layout with filters sidebar and scrollable results
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr; gap: 24px; align-items: start
use_case: Hotel/room search results with filtering

name: booking-summary
description: Sticky summary card with line items, taxes, and total
css_values: position: sticky; top: 24px; padding: 20px; border-radius: 12px; border: 1px solid var(--border)
use_case: Booking order summary sidebar

name: map-list-split
description: Split view with interactive map on one side and list on the other
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; height: calc(100vh - 64px)
use_case: Hotel search with map and list views

name: amenity-grid
description: Icon grid layout for displaying hotel/room amenities
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(140px, 1fr)); gap: 12px
use_case: Hotel amenities, room features display

name: rate-management
description: Dense grid for managing room rates across date ranges
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 160px repeat(auto-fill, 80px); overflow-x: auto
use_case: Rate management calendar for hotel staff

name: confirmation-page
description: Centered confirmation layout with booking details and next steps
css_values: max-width: 640px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 40px 24px; text-align: center
use_case: Booking confirmation, thank you pages

name: check-in-mobile
description: Mobile-optimized full-screen check-in flow
css_values: display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-height: 100vh; padding: 16px
use_case: Mobile self-service check-in process

name: responsive-grid
description: 12-column responsive grid system with configurable breakpoints
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(12, 1fr); gap: 16px
use_case: General page layouts across all screen sizes

name: breakpoints
description: Standard responsive breakpoints for consistent cross-device behavior
css_values: sm: 640px; md: 768px; lg: 1024px; xl: 1280px; 2xl: 1536px
use_case: Responsive design breakpoint definitions

name: container-width
description: Centered container with max-width constraints
css_values: max-width: 1280px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 16px; @media(min-width: 768px) { padding: 0 24px }
use_case: Page-level content container

name: flex-stack
description: Vertical flex stack with consistent gap spacing
css_values: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 16px
use_case: Stacking form fields, card lists, content sections

name: flex-row
description: Horizontal flex row with alignment and wrapping
css_values: display: flex; flex-direction: row; gap: 8px; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap
use_case: Button groups, tag lists, inline elements

name: full-page-center
description: Centered content for login, error, and empty state pages
css_values: display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; min-height: 100vh
use_case: Login page, 404 page, empty states

name: sticky-footer
description: Layout with sticky footer that stays at bottom
css_values: display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-height: 100vh; main { flex: 1 }
use_case: Pages with persistent footer navigation or actions

name: card-stack
description: Stacked card layout with consistent spacing
css_values: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 16px
use_case: Settings sections, form groups, content blocks

name: dialog-layout
description: Centered dialog/modal overlay layout
css_values: position: fixed; inset: 0; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
use_case: Modal dialogs, confirmation prompts

name: split-view
description: Adjustable split view layout
css_values: display: grid; grid-template-columns: var(--left-width, 1fr) var(--right-width, 1fr); height: 100%
use_case: Code editors, comparison views, master-detail
